row.entry: This module is used to set the white balance. You have 3 ways to interact with it. Either you set up tint, temperature in and temperature out. Or you define the value of each channel. Or you can choose predefined white balances.

sect4.title: temperatures
sect4.para: Set the tint, temperature in and temperature out (in Kelvin).

sect4.title: channels
sect4.para: Set the channel values on a scale from 0 to 5.

sect4.title: predefined values
sect4.para: You can choose between various predefined white balance. You can choose your camera white balance. A spot white balance is also available, using a zone you can draw with your mouse.
